852930.name: Fantasy Grounds - Sci-fi Species, Volume 3 (Token Pack)
852930.description:
Sci-fi Species, Volume 3

Boldly go where no man has gone before with Monster Grin's 160 new, unique tokens of sci-fi species, each usable as PCs, NPCs, mooks, friends, or foes! Stunningly depicted science-fiction characters will become unusual aliens, intergalactic combatants, spooky encounters, and much more in your next thrilling adventure in the deepest reaches of the final frontier! Utilize Monster Grin's Token Halo System to create different types of teams (red, gold, green, black, silver, or blue), or even different levels of the same kind of creature (i.e. boss, high, medium, or low level) to help keep track of whats what and whos who. Also, with Monster Grin's new Altered States tokens, you can get maximum value from each and every token in this pack and really take your game to the stars!
This token pack includes (ringed in black, blue, gold, green, greyscale, and silver, as well as ethereal, invisible, stone-skinned, sand-skinned, and altered state versions):
  • Bat-Faced Alien
  • Cute'n'Ugly Alien
  • Green Lady Alien
  • Grey Lady Alien
  • Plant Alien
  • Pug-Faced Alien
  • Red, Horned Alien
  • Sneering Alien
Conversion by: James Holloway
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset.
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by:
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
